name: transparently
content:
transparently adverb
(OBVIOUSLY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is clear and easy to understand or recognize: What she said was transparently untrue. I am pleased to see you so transparently happy.
More examplesFewer examplesHer meaning was now transparently clear.It was transparently obvious that the business was going to be a huge success.

transparently adverb
(WITHOUT SECRETS)
in a way that is open and honest: The hearings are open to the public and are conducted quite transparently. The two companies were able to negotiate transparently.
More examplesFewer examplesHe insisted that the government must conduct its financial affairs transparently.I am committed to ensuring that the competition will be run fairly and transparently.
